translated: Points of Controversy
The Great Fifty
The thirteenth section
The fixed and the unfixed
Is one who is fixed unfixed?
Yes.

original: Micchattaniyato sammattaniyāmaṁ okkamati, sammattaniyato micchattaniyāmaṁ okkamatīti?
analyzed: micchatta niyataḥ sammatta niyāmam okkamati sammatta niyataḥ micchatta niyāmam okkamati iti
translated: Is one who is unfixed fixed?

Is one who is fixed unfixed?
Yes.

original: Pubbe maggaṁ bhāvetvā pacchā niyāmaṁ okkamatīti?
analyzed: pubbe maggam bhāvetvā pacchā niyāmam okkamati iti
translated: Is one who is fixed unfixed after developing the path?🔽No.🔽Is one who is fixed unfixed after developing the path to the fruit of stream-entry?
“Is it so that the Blessed One has not declared the four noble truths?” …

original: pubbe sotāpattimaggaṁ bhāvetvā pacchā sotāpattiniyāmaṁ okkamatīti?
analyzed: pubbe sotāpatti maggaṃ bhāvetvā pacchā sotāpatti niyāmam okkamati iti
translated: Is one who is fixed unfixed after developing the path to the fruit of once-returning?

analyzed: na ha ivam vattabbe pe  pubbe sakadāgāmi pe  anāgāmi pe
translated: “It is not proper to say that …🔽“It is not proper to say that …🔽“It is not proper to say that …

analyzed: arahatta maggam bhāvetvā pacchā arahatta niyāmam okkamati iti
translated: Is one who is fixed unfixed after developing the path to the fruit of non-returning?

analyzed: na ha ivam vattabbe pe  pubbe sati paṭṭhānam pe
translated: No.🔽Is one who is fixed unfixed after developing the path to the fruit of perfection?🔽No.🔽Is one who is fixed unfixed after developing the foundations of mindfulness?🔽No.

original: sammappadhānaṁ … iddhipādaṁ … indriyaṁ … balaṁ … bojjhaṅgaṁ bhāvetvā pacchā niyāmaṁ okkamatīti?
analyzed: sammappadhānam iddhipādam indriyam balam bojjhaṅgam bhāvetvā pacchā niyāmam okkamati iti
translated: Is one who is fixed unfixed after developing the right efforts … the bases of spiritual success … the faculties … the powers … the factors of awakening?🔽No.

analyzed: na ha ivam vattabbe pe 🔽na vattabba
translated: You shouldn’t say that.
“Is he certain to enter the fixed course?”
“Yes.”

original: Bhabbo bodhisatto tāya jātiyā dhammaṁ nābhisametunti?
analyzed: bhabbaḥ bodhisatto tāya jātiyā dhammam na abhisametun ti
translated: “Is the Buddha-to-be able to realize the supreme perfect awakening in that lifetime?”
“Then is it that the Blessed One has not taught the Dhamma?” “One should not say so.”

analyzed: tena hi niyataḥ niyāmam okkamati iti
translated: “Well then, is he certain to enter the fixed course?”
The discussion of the certain one is finished.
